member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.ManuallyUpdate
member.summary: Manually update this by calling Move() or let it always be simulated. Not supported when PhysicallySimulated is enabled.

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.BodyMassOverride
member.summary: Kilos, tweak based on your surroundings, default boxes are like 600kg!

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.EnableCCD
member.summary: Enable Continuous Collision Detection (CCD) for the physics body. Useful for fast-moving characters to prevent tunneling through thin objects.

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.HidePhysicalComponents
member.summary: Hide the and components in the inspector

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.ScaleAgainstWalls
member.summary: If pushing against a wall, scale the velocity based on the wall's angle (False is useful for NPCs that get stuck on corners)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.RotateWithGameObject
member.summary: Rotate the trace with the gameobject

member.name: F:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.TraceType.Box
member.summary: This has no drawback, enjoy!

member.name: F:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.TraceType.Cylinder
member.summary: This is a PHYSICAL TRACE, so it's more expensive than the normal box or sphere trace

member.name: F:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.TraceType.Sphere
member.summary: This will disable as it's impossible to get the angle reliably

member.name: F:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.TraceType.Bounds
member.summary: No drawbacks, box but you can define exact bounds

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.TraceWidth
member.summary: Width of our trace

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.TraceHeight
member.summary: Height of our trace

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.TraceBounds
member.summary: Bounds of our trace

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IgnoreTags
member.summary: Which tags it should ignore

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.MaxBounces
member.summary: Max amount of trace calls whenever the simulation doesn't reach its target (Slide and collide bounces)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.AccelerationEnabled
member.summary: Acceleration and Deceleration

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GroundAcceleration
member.summary: How fast you accelerate while on the ground (Units per second)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.AirAcceleration
member.summary: How fast you accelerate while in the air (Units per second)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.FixedAcceleration
member.summary: Use the fixed acceleration value instead of curves

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.AccelerationCurve
member.summary:
How much acceleration based on the current velocity
X axis = Current Velocity (Maxes at 500 by default but you can modify)
Y axis *= Acceleration/>

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GroundDeceleration
member.summary: How fast you decelerate while on the ground (Units per second)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.AirDeceleration
member.summary: How fast you decelerate while in the air (Units per second)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.FixedDeceleration
member.summary: Use the fixed deceleration value instead of curves

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.DecelerationCurve
member.summary:
How much deceleration based on the current velocity
X axis = Current Velocity (Maxes at 500 by default but you can modify)
Y axis *= Deceleration/>

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IgnoreGroundSurface
member.summary: Do we ignore the friction of the surface you're standing on or not?

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IgnoreZ
member.summary: Is this MoveHelper meant for horizontal grounded movement? (false = For flying or noclip)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IgnoreZWhenZero
member.summary: Do we ignore Z when it's near 0 (So that gravity affects you when not moving)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.WallTolerance
member.summary: Tolerance from a 90° surface before it's considered a wall (Ex. Tolerance 1 = Between 89° and 91° can be a wall, 0.1 = 89.9° to 90.1°)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GripFactorReduction
member.summary: Player feels like it's gripping walls too much? Try more Grip Factor Reduction!

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.BouncingEnabled
member.summary: Bouncing off walls and ground on collision

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.HorizontalElasticity
member.summary:
How much the MoveHelper will "bounce" off walls when colliding with them
(0f = No bounce, 1f = Full bounce)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.VerticalElasticity
member.summary:
How much the MoveHelper will "bounce" off the ground when colliding with it
(0f = No bounce, 1f = Full bounce)
will override this value when sticking to the ground

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IncludeGroundElasticity
member.summary:
Include the ground elasticity when bouncing off the ground
Make sure the ground surface doesn't have a very low elasticity!

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.ElasticityThreshold
member.summary: Minimum velocity to allow bouncing

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GroundStickEnabled
member.summary: Stick the MoveHelper to the ground (IsOnGround will default to false if disabled)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.MaxGroundAngle
member.summary:
How steep terrain can be for you to stand on without slipping.
Min = Angle where velocity starts to drop off
Max = Max angle where velocity is fully blocked (you can still slide down with gravity)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GroundStickDistance
member.summary: How far from the ground the MoveHelper is going to stick (Useful for going down stairs!)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.StickToPlatforms
member.summary: Stick to any when standing on it

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.ApplySurfaceVelocity
member.summary: When the surface you're on has a surface velocity, apply it to the controller

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.StepsEnabled
member.summary: Enable steps climbing (+1 Trace call)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.StepHeight
member.summary: How high steps can be for you to climb on

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.StepDepth
member.summary: How deep it checks for steps (Minimum depth)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.StepTolerance
member.summary: Tolerance from a 90° surface before it's considered a valid step (Ex. Tolerance 1 = Between 89° and 91° can be a step, 0.1 = 89.9° to 90.1°)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.PseudoStepsEnabled
member.summary: Enable to ability to walk on a surface that's too steep if it's equal or smaller than a step (+1 Trace call when on steep terrain)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.PushEnabled
member.summary: Instead of colliding with these tags the MoveHelper will be pushed away (Make sure the tags are in IgnoreTags as well!)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.PushTagsWeight
member.summary: Which tags will push this MoveHelper away and with how much force (Make sure they are also included in IgnoreTags!) (+1 Trace call)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GravityEnabled
member.summary: Apply gravity to this MoveHelper when not on the ground

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.UseSceneGravity
member.summary: Use the scene's gravity or our own

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.UseVectorGravity
member.summary: Use a Vector3 gravity instead of a single float (Use this if you want to use a custom gravity)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.Gravity
member.summary: Units per second squared (Default is -850f)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.VectorGravity
member.summary:
Units per second squared (Default is 0f, 0f, -850f)
Changes which way sticks to the ground

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.UnstuckEnabled
member.summary: Check if the MoveHelper is stuck and try to get it to unstuck (+Trace calls if stuck)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.MaxUnstuckTries
member.summary: How many trace calls it will attempt to get the MoveHelper unstuck

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.WishVelocity
member.summary: The simulated target velocity for our MoveHelper (Units per second, we apply Time.Delta inside)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.Velocity
member.summary: The resulting velocity after the simulation is done (Units per second)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.ExternalVelocity
member.summary: Velocity controlled by outside factors, such as knockback, rootmotion, etc. It is only applied to our final position and doesn't affect our Velocity. It should be handled outside the controller.

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IsOnGround
member.summary: Is the MoveHelper currently touching the ground

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GroundNormal
member.summary: The current ground normal you're standing on (Always Vector3.Zero if IsOnGround false)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GroundAngle
member.summary: The current ground angle you're standing on (Always 0f if IsOnGround false)

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GetSlopeVelocityMultiplier(System.Single)
member.summary:
Gets the velocity multiplier for a given slope angle based on MaxGroundAngle range.
Returns 1.0 below the start angle, 0.0 at/above the max angle, and lerps between.

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IsAngleStandable(System.Single)
member.summary: Whether the given angle is considered standable (below max ground angle)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GroundSurface
member.summary: The current surface you're standing on

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.GroundObject
member.summary: The gameobject you're currently standing on

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IsPushingAgainstWall
member.summary: Is the MoveHelper currently pushing against a wall

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.WallNormal
member.summary: The current wall normal you're pushing against (Always Vector3.Zero if IsPushingAgainstWall false)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.WallObject
member.summary: The gameobject you're currently pushing on

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IsSlipping
member.summary: Is the MoveHelper standing on a terrain too steep to stand on (Always false if IsOnGround false)

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.IsStuck
member.summary: The MoveHelper is stuck and we can't get it out

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.SkinWidth
member.summary: To avoid getting stuck due to imprecision we shrink the bounds before checking and compensate for it later

member.name: P:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.Bounds
member.summary: The bounds of this MoveHelper generated from the TraceWidth and TraceHeight

member.name: F:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.UnstuckTarget
member.summary: If another MoveHelper moved at the same time and they're stuck, let this one know that the other already unstuck for us

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.BuildTrace(BBox,Vector3,Vector3)
member.summary: Casts the current bounds from to and returns the scene trace result

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.Punch(Vector3@)
member.summary: Detach the MoveHelper from the ground and launch it somewhere (Units per second)

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.Move(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Apply the WishVelocity, update the Velocity and the Position of the GameObject by simulating the MoveHelper
member.param: Just calculate but don't update position

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.Move(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Apply the WishVelocity, update the Velocity and the Position of the GameObject by simulating the MoveHelper
member.param: Just calculate but don't update position

member.name: T:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.MoveHelperResult
member.summary: Sometimes we have to update only the position but not the velocity (Like when climbing steps or getting unstuck) so we can't have Position rely only on Velocity

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.TryUnstuck(Vector3,Vector3@)
member.summary:
Attempts to return the nearest standable position until you're not longer inside other colliders
If it fails too frequently, consider increasing
member.returns: True if it found one, false if it failed.

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.ShrimpleCharacterController.TestPosition(Vector3,System.String)
member.summary: Debug don't use

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.Vector3Extensions.MoveTowards(Vector3,Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Move a vector3 towards a goal by a fixed distance

member.name: M:ShrimpleCharacterController.Vector3Extensions.ProjectAndScale(Vector3,Vector3)
member.summary: Project a vector along a plane (normal) and scale it back to its original length
